snippet: A federal appeals court on Friday gave Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton four months to decide whether the People’s Mujahedeen Organization of Iran should be removed from a list of foreign terrorist organizations.
abstract: Federal appeals court gives Sec of State Hillary Rodham Clinton four months to decide whether The People's Mujahedeen Organization of Iran should be removed from a list of foreign terrorist organizations.
lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court on Friday gave Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton four months to decide whether the People’s Mujahedeen Organization of Iran should be removed from a list of foreign terrorist organizations.

headline.main: Court Presses U.S. on a Terror Listing
headline.print_headline: Court Presses U.S. on a Terror Listing
